always_included_messages.content:
You are a proficient planner. Based on the provided information and query, please give me a detailed plan, including specifics such as flight numbers (e.g., F0123456), restaurant names, and accommodation names. Note that all the information in your plan should be derived from the provided data. You must adhere to the format given in the example. Additionally, all details should align with commonsense. The symbol '-' indicates that information is unnecessary. For example, in the provided sample, you do not need to plan after returning to the departure city. When you travel to two cities in one day, you should note it in the 'Current City' section as in the example (i.e., from A to B).

***** Example *****
Query: Could you create a travel plan for 7 people from Ithaca to Charlotte spanning 3 days, from March 8th to March 14th, 2022, with a budget of $30,200?
Travel Plan:
Day 1:
Current City: from Ithaca to Charlotte
Transportation: Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46
Breakfast: Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte
Attraction: The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte
Lunch: Cafe Maple Street, Charlotte
Dinner: Bombay Vada Pav, Charlotte
Accommodation: Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte

Day 2:
Current City: Charlotte
Transportation: -
Breakfast: Olive Tree Cafe, Charlotte
Attraction: The Mint Museum, Charlotte;Romare Bearden Park, Charlotte.
Lunch: Birbal Ji Dhaba, Charlotte
Dinner: Pind Balluchi, Charlotte
Accommodation: Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte

Day 3:
Current City: from Charlotte to Ithaca
Transportation: Flight Number: F3786167, from Charlotte to Ithaca, Departure Time: 21:42, Arrival Time: 23:26
Breakfast: Subway, Charlotte
Attraction: Books Monument, Charlotte.
Lunch: Olive Tree Cafe, Charlotte
Dinner: Kylin Skybar, Charlotte
Accommodation: -

***** Example Ends *****

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").
current_city.title: Current City

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"
transportation.title: Transportation

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"
breakfast.title: Breakfast

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"
attraction.title: Attraction

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
accommodation.title: Accommodation

functions.name: delegate
functions.desc:
Ask a capable helper for help looking up a piece of information or performing an action.
Do not simply repeat what the user said as instructions.
You should use this to break up complex user queries into multiple simpler steps.
NOTE: Helpers cannot see previous parts of your conversation.

instructions.description: Detailed instructions on what your helper should do to help you.
instructions.title: Instructions

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.
city.title: City

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.
city.title: City

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.
state.title: State

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.
departure_city.title: Departure City

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.
destination_city.title: Destination City

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.
date.title: Date

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.
origin.title: Origin

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.
destination.title: Destination

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.
city.title: City

The state of Florida has a lot to offer in terms of accommodation options. Depending on your preferences and desired activities, here are some popular and comfortable options in different cities, all within your 7-day budget of $7,800:

1. **Orlando**: Orlando is a popular tourist destination known for its theme parks. You can find budget-friendly hotels near the attractions, such as the Rosen Inn International, offering comfortable rooms with amenities like a pool and free Wi-Fi, starting at around $80 per night. This would leave you with a comfortable daily budget of around $123 for other expenses. 

2. **Miami**: Miami is a vibrant city with a lively atmosphere. For a great value stay, consider the Red Roof Inn Miami Airport, which provides clean and modern rooms with a continental breakfast included. Rates start at approximately $92 per night, leaving you with a daily budget of about $114 for exploring Miami's beaches and nightlife. 

3. **Fort Lauderdale**: Known for its beautiful beaches and yacht-lined canals, Fort Lauderdale offers a more relaxed atmosphere. The Courtyard by Marriott Fort Lauderdale Beach is a great option, with rates starting at around $110 per night, including a complimentary breakfast and free Wi-Fi. This would give you around $103 per day for other expenses. 

4. **Daytona Beach**: A popular destination for races and car enthusiasts, Daytona Beach also boasts beautiful beaches. The Days Inn by Wyndham Daytona Beach LPGA Boulevard offers comfortable rooms with a pool and free breakfast, starting at approximately $85 per night. With this option, you'd have a daily budget of about $127 for enjoying the beach and other activities. 

5. **Tampa**: Tampa is a vibrant city with a lively downtown and a beautiful riverfront. The Embassy Suites by Hilton Tampa Downtown, featuring a complimentary breakfast and an evening reception, is a great choice with rates starting at around $120 per night. This would leave you with a daily budget of about $102 for exploring Tampa's attractions. 

6. **Jacksonville**: Jacksonville is a great destination for golf enthusiasts and outdoor adventures. The Best Western Hotel JTB/Southside offers comfortable rooms with a pool and free breakfast, starting at approximately $90 per night. With this option, you'd have around $122 per day to spend on exploring Jacksonville's natural wonders. 

7. **Key West**: Key West is an island city known for its vibrant atmosphere and stunning sunsets. The Comfort Inn Key West, offering a pool and free breakfast, is a great value choice with rates starting at around $115 per night. This would leave you with a daily budget of approximately $108 for enjoying the island's unique charm. 

8. **West Palm Beach**: For a relaxing beach vacation, consider West Palm Beach. The Holiday Inn Express & Suites West Palm Beach Central offers spacious rooms with a pool and free breakfast, starting at approximately $105 per night. This option provides a daily budget of around $117 for exploring the nearby beaches and attractions. 

9. **Gainesville**: Gainesville is a university town with a vibrant student population. The Comfort Suites University offers comfortable rooms with a pool and free breakfast, starting at around $95 per night. This would give you a daily budget of about $119 for exploring Gainesville's unique culture and nightlife. 

10. **Fort Myers**: Fort Myers is a coastal city with beautiful beaches and nature reserves. The Best Western Fort Myers Waterfront offers comfortable rooms with a pool and free breakfast, starting at approximately $100 per night. With this option, you'd have a daily budget of about $113 for enjoying the local attractions and nature trails. 

11. **Sarasota**: A charming coastal city, Sarasota offers a relaxed atmosphere and beautiful beaches. The La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Sarasota, featuring a pool and free breakfast, is a great value choice with rates starting at around $90 per night. This would leave you with a daily budget of approximately $123 for exploring Sarasota's arts and culture scene. 

These accommodations provide a good balance between comfort and value, ensuring you can make the most of your trip to Florida while staying within your budget.

Here is a list of must-see attractions and delicious restaurants for breakfast, lunch, and dinner during your 7-day trip to Miami, Orlando, and Tampa:

## Miami:

### Attractions:
- Jungle Island: A unique wildlife park and entertainment complex with interactive exhibits and shows, located at 1111 Parrot Jungle Trail, Miami, FL 33132.
- Pérez Art Museum Miami (PAMM): The museum showcases modern and contemporary art in a stunning waterfront location at 1103 Biscayne Blvd, Miami, FL 33132.
- Bayfront Park: A beautiful urban park with a rich history, offering stunning city and bay views at 301 Biscayne Blvd, Miami, FL 33132.
- Wynwood Walls: This outdoor street art gallery displays vibrant and ever-changing murals, located at 2516 NW 2nd Ave, Miami, FL 33127.
- Miami Seaquarium: One of the oldest oceanariums in the United States, featuring a wide variety of marine life at 4400 Rickenbacker Cswy, Key Biscayne, FL 33149.
- Vizcaya Museum & Gardens: A historic estate with beautiful European-inspired gardens and art collections at 3251 S Miami Ave, Miami, FL 33129.

### Restaurants:

#### Breakfast:
- Clocked: Offering a range of cuisines including tea, Italian, Mexican, BBQ, and cafe, with an average cost of $49 and a rating of 4.2.

#### Dinner:

- The Diet Kitchen: Specializing in bakery, BBQ, Indian, Mediterranean, and seafood, rated 3.3.
- L'Opera: A dessert and seafood restaurant with an average cost of $28 and a rating of 3.7.

## Orlando:

### Attractions:
- SeaWorld Orlando: A world-famous marine-life theme park with rides and shows at 7007 Sea World Dr, Orlando, FL 32821.
- The Wheel at ICON Park: A giant observation wheel offering amazing views of the city at Orlando, FL 32819.
- Universal Orlando Resort: A popular theme park with thrilling rides and attractions at 6000 Universal Blvd, Orlando, FL 32819.
- The Wizarding World of Harry Potter - Diagon Alley and Hogsmeade: Immerse yourself in the world of Harry Potter at Universal Studios and Islands of Adventure.
- Ripley's Believe It or Not!: An entertaining museum filled with oddities and curiosities at 8201 International Dr, Orlando, FL 32819.
- Gatorland: A unique park dedicated to alligators and crocodiles, offering shows and exhibits at 14501 S Orange Blossom Trl, Orlando, FL 32837.

### Restaurants:

- Fuji Japanese Steakhouse: Serving Japanese cuisine with an average cost of $75 and a rating of 3.8.

#### Dinner:
- Hotel New Tamil Nadu: Serving desserts, Italian, fast food, and Mediterranean seafood, rated 0.0.
- Lawn Bistro: Specializing in fast food, bakery, and Italian with an average cost of $100 and a rating of 3.6.
- Reena Restaurant: Featuring fast food, seafood, bakery, and Italian, rated 3.5.

## Tampa:

### Attractions:
- The Florida Aquarium: Discover a diverse range of aquatic life at 701 Channelside Dr, Tampa, FL 33602.
- Busch Gardens Tampa Bay: A popular theme park with thrilling rides and animal encounters at 10165 McKinley Dr, Tampa, FL 33612.
- Adventure Island: A water park with exciting water slides and attractions adjacent to Busch Gardens.
- Henry B. Plant Museum: A historic museum showcasing the grandeur of the Victorian era at 401 W Kennedy Blvd, Tampa, FL 33606.
- Tampa Bay History Center: Learn about Tampa's rich history at 801 Water St, Tampa, FL 33602.
- Tampa Museum of Art: Explore a diverse collection of contemporary and modern art at 120 W Gasparilla Plaza, Tampa, FL 33602.

### Restaurants:

#### Breakfast:
- Kobe Hibachi & Sushi: A sushi and hibachi restaurant with an average cost of $63 and a rating of 4.6.
- The Tin Cow: Serving BBQ and seafood, rated 3.7.
- Peg Leg Pete's: A French, bakery, and cafe with an average cost of $91 and a rating of 4.4.

#### Lunch:
- Lalit Kathi Rolls Momos: Specializing in tea, pizza, and fast food, rated 3.1.
- Aahar: A tea, pizza, desserts, and fast-food restaurant with an average cost of $52 and a rating of 2.0.
